login_sso: Log in with your University account
name: Name
match_steps: Share Laboratory or Clinical Equipment, Chemicals & Disposables
steps_intro:
The Laboratory Exchange platform (LABEXUS) makes supply and demand of lab equipment, Chemicals & Disposables visible and thus contributes to their better use. LABEXUS is intended for the exchange of:

  • Laboratory or Clinical Equipment
  • Chemical substances
  • Disposables
filter_existing_description: Enter the data of your offer or request and check if it matches existing material.
select_match_or_save: Select a match or save for later
select_match_or_save_description: If you have a direct match, select the match to complete it. If no match is present, save it for future (automatic) matches.
exchange_after_approval_description: After a match is found contact info will be made available through the LABEXUS platform. You can contact the owner of the offer or request and arrange transfer or shared use of the material.
submit_my_request: I don't see a match below - Save my request for future matches
submit_my_offer: I don't see a match below - Save my offer for future matches
field_required: This field is required, please fill it in.
field_not_valid: This field does not contain a valid value
submit_offer_intro: This page can be used to submit new material into the database. Please enter the appropriate data points to match your offer.
edit_offer_intro: This page can be used to update existing material.
edit_request_intro: This page can be used to update your outstanding request.
offers_intro: This page can be used to browse through offers made by others. Each offer can be selected to view the detail page and ‘claim’ this offer.
requests_intro: This page can be used to browse through requests made by others. Each request can be selected to view the detail page and match this request.
review_single_match: This page shows how a single request or offer can be reviewed by users.
review_1: See if the specifications match your preferences.
review_2: Select this match for exchange or return to the overview to view more options.
confirm_offer: Please complete the details of your offer
confirm_offer_description: Please provide any missing details about your offer below. By confirming the following match, you are activating the system to send an email to the connected match so you can share further details to exchange the selected material.
confirm_request: Please complete the details of your request
confirm_request_description: Please provide any missing details about your request below. By confirming the following match, you are activating the system to send an email to the connected match so you can share further details to exchange the selected material.
extra_information_placeholder: Please provide any required details about your request here.
my_matches_intro: This page is used to review your selected matches, both requests and offers. Your matches will need to be approved or declined by a moderator first, before allowing the exchange.
dashboard_intro: Welcome to the the Laboratory Exchange platform (LABEXUS). You can easily add your spare lab equipment, chemicals and disposables to find a new (temporary) home.
more_info_dashboard_description: More information about the project with links to relevant external documents
submit_request_description: This page can be used to submit new requests to the database. Please enter the relevant criteria for your request and submit.
dashboard_subheader: For lab equipment, chemicals and disposables
approve_match: Do you approve of this match?
faq_intro: We continually update this FAQ page to provide in answers to all your questions regarding the functionalities of our Laboratory Exchange platform.
title: Title
flowchart_intro: While filtering and searching for matches, please keep the following 'flow' in mind to make the best use out of the existing offers and requests.
matches_intro: The matching process requires an approval by one of the moderators first in some cases before it can take place. You will be informed by email about the status of the match.
confirm_cancel_match: Confirm the cancellation of your match
confirm_cancel_match_description: Please make sure that you would like to cancel the match. Only do this whenever the given offer/request does not match what you are offering/requesting.
confirm_delete_description: Are you sure you would like to delete this item?
copy_password_before_saving: Make sure you copy/save the password before saving the user and 'losing' the password
alerts_description: Here you can configure your personal alerts based on your needs, so you only receive email updates whenever a relevant offer or request is posted on the LABEXUS platform.
add_new_alert_description: Here you can easily and freely select which specifications are a 'must' for you to receive an email about. If you want to see all the requests and offers coming in, you can leave all the fields empty and click on 'Add new alert'.
approve_match_description: Describe any details that might help after approving the match.
reject_match_description: Please explain to the researchers why the match was declined.
why_reject_message: Why did you decline the match?
specifications_device_description: (age, capacity (e.g. water bath, incubator), speed (centrifuge), brand, type number, etc.)
contact_details_info: Use this field if contact info differs from your own contact info.
your_organisation_does_not_have_access: Your organisation does not have access to the platform yet.
check_email_verification_inbox: Confirm the email verification notice in your inbox to complete the sign up.
email_already_exists: Given e-mail address already has an existing account.
you_are_not_allowed_to_add_content: You are not allowed to add content.
